name: Intelligent System Self-Optimization Loop
description: A high-reasoning refinement cycle where the Reforge Specialist analyzes live execution logs to detect semantic drift or tool failures. This epic drives the continuous evolution of our Environments and Dialects, ensuring that model performance remains peak and cost-effective.
example_task: Review the last 100 entries in the System Event Stream. Identify one model reasoning failure and propose a Dialect or Environment update to fix it.

issues.note: Examine orket.log for tool-call failures or 'hallucination_guard' triggers. Record intent in Card System.
Adjust temperatures in environments/*.json. Track reasoning via comments.
Refine phrasing in model/core/teams/standard.json. Use comments for handoff.
